comments.author: Evil Twin
comments.content: Why don't you do that in real life instead?

comments.author: rheide
comments.content: If we were twins, I would be the evil one!

comments.author: jaydeejapan
comments.content: Aren't masks wonderful?  The work for pollen, but not for viruses.  People will wear masks if they're sick, but they certainly aren't very effective.  They're only good for hay fever.
